messages.text: I need to update my payment method for my loan.
Sure, Bianca. Your loan was paid off recently. Anything else?
Have you ever been involved in any violent incidents?
Yes, I was involved in an altercation last year. I regret it.
Thank you for your honesty. Was there a legal outcome?
Yes, I was found guilty of assault and served time.
I was convicted of fraud in 2021, but I have changed since then.
